DOC.brief_summary: The aim study effect milk versus cheese fecal fat excretion blood lipid . To , randomize crossover intervention study 3 14-day period ( control diet , milk diet , cheese diet ) conduct 16 young male . Fasting blood sample collect period , fecal sample collect last 5 day period .
DOC.brief_title: Effect Milk Cheese Fecal Fat Excretion Blood Lipid
DOC.criteria: Healthy male BMI 2028 mg/m2 Smoking Medicine use Dietary supplement Lactose intolerance , milk allergy Dislike dairy product Excessive physical activity ( > 10h/wk ) Known chronic illness
